title: Pacific Coast convention
abstract: A splendid Convention, with varied engineering subjects and delightful entertainment, is being planned and will be held at Portland, Oregon, September 2–5. Headquarters will be at the Multnomah Hotel. Five technical sessions, two Student Branch sessions, and a conference on student activities by the Counselors' Committee from Districts Nos. 8 and 9 comprise the technical and business phases of the program.
